name: Robottik
description:
Hello,

this is Robottik my very first Game, made with Unity. It was developed for the Gamejam: Gamedevjs 2020.

I know it's a bit poor of a game, but i honestly am a little bit proud of it, since it's my first Game and made alone.

So if you want to try it: Get rid of some Electro-Sucking Bats!
